title: Arugula, Pear & Red Potato Quesadilla With Apple Balsamic Reduc
summary: Arugula, Pear & Red Potato Quesadilla With Apple Balsamic Reduc is a vegetarian recipe with 1 servings. For $2.25 per serving, this recipe covers 27% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 494 calories, 10g of protein, and 6g of fat. 185 people were impressed by this recipe. A mixture of onion, pear, coconut oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. Several people really liked this hor d'oeuvre. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 20 minutes. It is an affordable recipe for fans of Mexican food. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 98%. This score is tremendous. Try Pear Quesadilla (Quesadilla de Pera), Turkey Reuben Quesadilla with Pear, and Pear, Brie, and Honey Quesadilla for similar recipes.
instructions: Lets get started.Preheat oven to 350F. Slice the potatoes and place in a glass casserole dish with about 2 tbsp water in the bottom. Roast potatoes for about 10 minutes. Slice pear and set aside.
